channel.title: How to host?
channel.description: This dude forsaken is opening a good graphic old school 317 server @ Http://internalx.org but he needs a hoster or can you tell me how to host you can find me on here or @ http://internalx.org

item.title: How to host?
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Lol, host in on ur own pc?
Anyways 59 player(ur sig) must be worth a vps.
Anyway,

Step 1 portforward (tons of tuts on this)
Sten 2 turn firewall off or you need to make rules for the ports.
Step 3 set up no-ip (countkess tuts for this asswel
Step 4 dl no-ip and select ur host
Step 5 change the client ips in ur no-ip
Step 6 run ur source :o that isnt hard

Read full topic
